name: Dungeon Man
description:
Make your way through 15 levels and defeat the Evil Toilet Snake.

Full screen to have a bigger view.

Use WASD to move.

Space to dash

Left Click to attack, Right click to change crystals

Esc or P to pause

M to Mute

Made for Mizjam 1

Special thanks to Wolfenrahd and Nuvares for all the help!

This is my first game! I hope you enjoy it!
